Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace reconstructed in modern times. In the centre, a group of disc-shaped beads of green-blue enamel framed by larger black disc-shaped beads. Three beads, also disc-shaped but made from ostrich eggshell, separate the groups.
